org.osdfreactive.policystorage

Class PolicyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onosproject.event.AbstractListenerManager<PolicyEvent,PolicyListener>
      • org.osdfreactive.policystorage.PolicyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.onosproject.event.ListenerService<PolicyEvent,PolicyListener>, PolicyService

    @Service
public class PolicyManager
extends org.onosproject.event.AbstractListenerManager<PolicyEvent,PolicyListener>
implements PolicyService
    Policy Manager which handles storing and retrieving network policies.
